properties.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains; Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; West Glacier Region
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 6 at 7:23AM MST until January 8 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Periods of light to moderate snow
expected with total accumulations of 15 to 30 inches possible
by Wednesday morning over mountain passes and higher terrain.
The period of most intense snow fall is expected Monday
afternoon and evening where 1" per hour is expected. Winds
gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...In Montana, West Glacier Region, Lower Clark Fork
Region and Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. In Idaho, Northern
Clearwater Mountains and Southern Clearwater Mountains.

* WHEN...From 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening to 5 AM MST /4 AM
PST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY
